title: Who Is on Our All-NBA Playoff Team? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by The Ringer’s Justin Verrier to recap the Bucks’ Game 5 victory over the Hawks (1:11). Then they each draft an All–NBA Playoff Team (14:04).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Justin Verrier
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
